title: Will strive to make SBI most valued financial institution: Chairman Setty
description: C S Setty, the new Chairman of SBI, outlined his vision to enhance the bank’s net profit and establish it as India's 'Best Bank'. With a vast customer base and significant market capitalisation, Setty thanked his predecessors and vowed to build on their achievements. He highlighted the critical role of SBI in India’s evolving economy.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
